x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Farmers in Nigeria lack transparency in fertilizer and seed distribution. Manual tracking invites corruption and delays. Buyers can’t trace farm-to-market origins.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Supply Chain Operations and Procurement Operations for tracking goods flow.
  • Automation Engine for scanning and verifying supplier docs.
  • IntegrationHub for linking with blockchain or export compliance APIs.
  • UI Builder for farmers' and cooperatives' dashboards.
  • Performance analytics for sustainability metrics.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

We would use the Blockchain traceability API, but it will be optional, and the mobile app framework for farmer field data.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Onboarding farmers and training them with the digital tools
  • Integration with low-data regions
  • Authenticating suppliers in informal markets
